      • getNullProbability

        public double getNullProbability()
        Returns the probability for this field returning null. If the value is 0 then no nextValue() is null, if it is 1 then every nextValue() is null.
        Returns:
        the probability between 0 and 1

      • nullProbability

        public ArrayRandomField nullProbability(double newNullProbability)
        Sets the probability for this field returning null. If the value is 0 then no nextValue() is null, if it is 1 then every nextValue() is null.
        Parameters:
        newNullProbability - the probability between 0 and 1
        Returns:
        this instance

      • setNullProbability

        public void setNullProbability(double nullProbability)
        Sets the probability for this field returning null. If the value is 0 then no nextValue() is null, if it is 1 then every nextValue() is null.
        Parameters:
        nullProbability - the probability between 0 and 1

      • getArrayLength

        public int getArrayLength()
        Returns the standard array length. A Gaussian function is used to scatter the actual array length around this value.
        Returns:
        array length

      • arrayLength

        public ArrayRandomField arrayLength(int newArrayLength)
        Sets the standard array length. A Gaussian function is used to scatter the actual array length around this value.
        Parameters:
        newArrayLength - array length
        Returns:
        this instance
